workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.36960971506774104 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.10289941306286632 --weight-decay 0.0002669233874985552 --lr 0.0005796457727260848 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 95935 --max-lr 0.0006223763216364475 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.2826260649503791 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.05732223525987201 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
